Wedding Might Be On The Cards Next Year For Sushmita Sen And Rumoured Beau Rohman Shawl, Claim Reports!
Out of all the things that happen at the most unexpected time in life, love is clearly the most unavoidable one. It just happens and even before you realize you have been hit by the cupid, you have already added that person in every sphere of your life. For model-actor Sushmita Sen, love currently is making her glow with happiness.
Sush has made her relationship public with beau Rohman Shawl. From getting clicked at the airports together to celebrating festivals together, the couple has taken things to another level and how. Reports that have dropped in recently claims that they have spoken about marriage and might take the plunge in 2019.
A source close to Sush has been quoted in a DNA report as saying,
Viral Bhayani
"Sushmita and Rohman have been dating for two months after they met at a fashion gala and enjoy a good equation. The duo has even discussed the idea of marriage and if things go as planned, they will take their marital vows next year.”
The decision to tie the knot is an amicable and mature decision by both Sush and Rohman and taking their own sweet time to make their bond stronger, the couple might plan a winter wedding next year. The source added,
Instagram
“Rohman has already proposed to Sushmita and she has agreed, which is why she decided to go public with the relationship. They are currently figuring out when would be a good time to tie the knot, but as of now, the couple is looking at a date around winter 2019.”
Considering the fact that Sush's daughters also look happy around Rohman, it would be safe to assume that he is loved and accepted by everyone close to Sushmita.
